DataElement.preferredDefinition: Calendar date of documented sustained donor engraftment followed by 1) severe neutropenia (ANC < 500/mm3) and bone marrow biopsy with cellularity of less than 25%, or 2) absence of donor cells in the marrow or blood demonstrated by a chimerism assay without subsequent improvement either spontaneously or after growth factor treatment.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Patient  Secondary Graft Failure After Hematopoietic Cell Transplantation Occurrence
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary._Loss of donor hematopoietic cells following initial engraftment._Occurrence; an instance of something happening.

ObjectClass.preferredName: Patient Secondary Secondary Graft Failure After Hematopoietic Cell Transplantation
ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.:Derived as a result of a primary condition; not direct or immediate; of second rank or importance or value.:Loss of donor hematopoietic cells following initial engraftment.

Concepts.definition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.
Derived as a result of a primary condition; not direct or immediate; of second rank or importance or value.

Concepts.longName: Secondary Graft Failure After Hematopoietic Cell Transplantation
Concepts.definition: Loss of donor hematopoietic cells following initial engraftment.

Property.preferredDefinition: Occurrence; an instance of something happening.

Concepts.definition: An instance of something happening, such as an event or incident.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the results or effects (does not include CTC Adverse Events) of therapeutic agents or procedures administered to the patient.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Date as required for Clinical Trials Monitoring Service submissions.  Exchange format is YYYYMMDD.  Display format is DDMMMYYYY, with the month display the first three letters of each month (Jan, Feb, Mar, etc.).

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: a particular day specified as the time something has, or will, happen.

Concepts.definition: The particular day, month and year an event has happened or will happen.

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 8/30/17 jk Transferred context, added CSI and reg status, released per Round 5 finalization task. --- Display and exchange formats are based on CTMS reporting requirements v.3.02 and all subsequent versions of these guidelines.

DataElement.changeDescription: Created to support NCI Center for Cancer Research (CCR) transplantation trial
